website_summaries.verdict: This 4K TV offers dynamic picture quality that's perfect for viewing and gaming, along with a contemporary design that looks great in modern homes.
pros: Features the brand's Al ThinQ smart capability that includes a voice-controlled remote and responsive processor
Delivers beautiful picture quality and HDR technology
cons: A few owners report difficulty adjusting the brightness level

customer_reviews.title: How to fix brightness issue
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv. Easy installation - from box to viewing, took us about 1.5 hrs, which included the run to the hardware store for screws that fit the tv to our existing wall mount. I rarely write reviews, but in the interest of saving other's time, here is the specific solution to the dark screen caused by the default energy saving feature. Once set up, go to Settings, scroll to bottom, select All Settings. The new menu will include at the top Picture. Choose that, then turn off the energy saving feature. That's it, and the picture is now of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blonder

customer_reviews.title: Black out
customer_reviews.text: Well in the beginning the TV was great but two months after having it. it start it to blacks out when I’m watching shows on my kids are playing a video game. They did send a technician he looked at the TV took it apart to replace the board. but he said he had the wrong part and it will be a couple days for the right part to come in for me to let them know if the TV keeps going out. So right now I’m waiting to see what they’re going to do for me about this TV what use do I have of it if it keeps going out.
customer_reviews.author: blackpipe

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: So far I love everything about this TV. I love that it has Hulu, Netflix and Google play. I have an Amazon Fire Stick and can't get Google Play so it's nice to have all those options on the TV. The picture is great. I don't know about the sound because I hooked up my sound bar and subwoofer but before I did, I briefly caught a sample of the sound quality and it seemed fine. I just prefer my subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: amazing picture for the price. low input lag for gamers
customer_reviews.text: if you are a gamer, this is the tv for you. there is low risk for image burn if you play games with heads up displays (call of duty, racing games, etc). the game mode reduces input lag to rates comparable to 60hz monitors, and the picture quality is great. not quite oled level blacks, but quite impressive with the new led technology lg developed. picture gets bright once you turn off power saving mode and calibrate it.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Absolute unreliable trash
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's cheap for something in its category, but there are plenty of reasons. A terrible WIFI card that drops the signal every 5 minutes, limited apps, only 4 HDMI outputs (most Vizio models in this category have 5 or more), a rigorous setup process, constant interruptive updates on bloatware apps, and many more! Magic Remote is pretty cool though. Buy a Samsung or a Vizio instead. Edit: Dropped to one star. This thing is the dumbest smart tv on the market. Zero WiFi reliability has made this a regular flat screen. LG is total garbage. There are TVs for $500 less that give you more than this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp pic and ease of set up.
customer_reviews.text: I like the very thin body. It beats the old bulky ones. The picture is terrific. Easy to set up except pairing it with my DISH TV. I’ll need help.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Reece

customer_reviews.title: N I C E  Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Fairly easy installation; remembering and typing my WI-FI password was the most challenging. The picture is great since I remembered to go into setup and remove the energy saving feature. The sound was the most surprising because I was expecting poor sound quality but received a sufficient sound quality. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Henry

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: After some adjusting the picture is amazing! Love this TV! Really good price, amazing picture, 65 inches, who could ask for more? The only thing I was concerned about was the stand. The TV seems unsteady, but you can shake it and try and tip it and she stays put. The pictures don't do it justice, but you can see the quality, and I put my pinky finger across the top so you can see just how thin it really is. Don't hesitate, this is one purchase you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Poor Picture Speed
customer_reviews.text: With a 240 motion rate, I expected this unit to keep up with all types of action scenes. Many, and I repeat MANY, of the pictures run jittery or jerky during motion sequences. We have HD quality satellite TV service. I'm not sure where the problem is, but I can only assume it is the TV because this was never the case with our previous LG 50" that only had a 120 motion rate using the same satellite (DirecTV) service. I tried to return the unit but never received return shipping instructions form the seller, so i missed my return by date of 2/3/19. Very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Tranchina

customer_reviews.title: lights up in sections? WHY?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to splurge a bit and get what's supposed to be a superior tv (compared to the ones I have been getting) instead the picture quality is equal to if not less then my 4-year-old Vizio TV. The LG has this stupid thing where it lights up with like a grayish black in line segments giving a very inconsistent image. I looked and found that this is "normal" for this tv. I would not recomend this tv at all. with I had just stuck with Vizio. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grayson

customer_reviews.title: LG TV
customer_reviews.text: This product has a defect as of April 17, 2019. I purchased this TV July 2018. I explained what the TV was doing multiple times to multiple people (3 to be exact). It was like they were interrogating me. I have a 1 year manufactures warrant and a 4 yr extra warranty. I contacted LG at 800-243-0000 and they gave me the absolute run around. I haven't had this TV 9 months. I wanted AMAZON to know how difficult it is to utilize the warranty that I purchased. Its makes me not want to purchase any big ticket item again. I can be reached at 202.247.1999. mwnettles@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL N.

customer_reviews.title: Worst TV ever
customer_reviews.text: Alexa doesn’t work at all. Every other day some software updates needs done. I won’t recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: nisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv, one of the best i bought.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is absolutely perfect, it has so many features not even listed here. Every problem people are listing can be easily fixed either with a simple wired internet connection (the wifi works fine for me btw) and going into your settings to fix the dimming and other problems. Everything can be fixed and disabled etc in the settings i don't know how old some of you are but if you can't set this tv up get your grandson or something to do it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Boris L

customer_reviews.title: This is not compatible with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: The TV itself is very nice, clear picture, decent enough sound. But the software that LG has for the Alexa app DOES NOT WORK. It is able to pair to the TV, but the only thing I have gotten Alexa to be able to do is turn the TV off. All other commands give errors. Until LG can figure out how to write this software, they should not be claiming that it is Alexa compatible. Seems like false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah_quite_contrary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: In hdr mode darks are gray and not clear Tried everything Also not as bright and vibrant as my 8 year old Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping better but good picture for movies and games
customer_reviews.text: Owned the TV for a few days now. I chose this on over the Samsung nu8000 only because the $100 dollar price drop 2 weeks ago. This one does have brightness issues and light bulging that bothers me at times. Don't no if I feel like going thru the trouble to return though. Movies and Games do look really good after adjusting settings. But regular TV just ok
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome television! I love the smart features and magic remote. There really isn't anything negative to say about this television.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: Picture is awesome, the smart part of the tv works great. Only had one time where the apps froze and i had to unplug the tv in the 6mo. we’ve owned it. If you take the tv off of power saver mode, the picture isnt dark and looks great. The only con ive found with the 8000 series is it has 5 vertical zones and when the picture is mostly black you can see the zones light up slightly... its not horrible but after having a plasma it makes a person think about buying a oled... but for those prices i can live with this for many many years.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but absolutely love this tv!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about getting a TV from online without being able to see it in person or test it out. I was also worried it would arrive broke. With the Christmas madness it arrived inside 2 boxes and styrofoam and was safe as can be. Once we got it on the wall I was really pleased with it. I never wanted a TV in my room but it’s a nice treat once the kids are tucked into bed and I just want to binge for a little before going to bed myself. Easy to use and such great quality!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: The magic remote is annoying. Although having a cursor is a great idea, it is hard to control. The remote lacks functionality, so I still need to and prefer to use the cable remote. The picture is amazing: clear and almost 3D in its depth. The sound is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Round Bottom Remote
customer_reviews.text: The remote with a rounded bottom was designed by an egghead design engineer. Who designs something to be round that you place on flat surfaces? The remote constantly rolls over, falls and control buttons are hit in the fall and the program keeps getting altered. Get ride of the design engineer unless the intention was to design something to fail, in that case they nailed it. POS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart Functions Are Buggy
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent TV with good picture and sound. The reason I got this TV was because of it's ability to integrate with smart home devices but this feature is quite buggy and doesn't work half the time, especially with Alexa. The Google Assistant built into the TV is not user friendly. Netflix and Amazon apps work great, however but the built in browser freezes constantly when trying to stream videos I ended up connecting a Roku, it's much more reliable. Bottom line, this TV isn't as smart as it is portrayed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, mediocre WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! The picture is great, the sound is OK (I hooked it into my surround system after a brief test so your mileage may vary). My only complaint is the WiFi antenna is inadequate. I experienced frequent "no network" messages when connected to my WiFi and those messages all went away the moment I plugged my ethernet cable in. My router is only 15' away, but has to go through 3 walls. Still, all the other devices in the same room get great WiFi reception. If you don't have access to wired ethernet, there are external adapters that plug into the wired ethernet port to add wireless as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was very fast. The TV was quite painful to install on the stand mode. Screws for the base feel wrong. Image quality is good. Only noticeable artifact is when a bright shape moves on a dark background. You can see some distracting side light around the bright shape. In my experience I started seeing horizontal black lines after updating the TV software (see attached picture of the left top corner of TV). I called Amazon and they took care of the refund. I really enjoyed this TV. The menus are easy to find and the remote/mouse is the best of it's kind. I will buy this TV again once my refund goes through.
customer_reviews.author: alejosoft

customer_reviews.title: Great television! I love its compatibility with the smart remote!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. The AI is not so responsive with its search abilities! The sound appears to be a little underwhelming. But the picture is A1, and on par with any other in its class!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great sound & excellent picture quality. Setup was a little complicated. There is a tutorial that will talk you through the setup. We picked the visually impaired option which was a big mistake, every time we changed the channel, turned the volume up, or pushed any button on the remote the most annoying voice announced it. We were able to turn that option off but it took a while to figure out. The apps are great and you can also get on the internet with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Became unreliable just after waranty
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half, the TV began to have numerous intermittent problems. The Bluetooth fails from time to time. The cursor for the remote disappears. The TV powers itself off and back on for no reason. Customer service had no ideas. They agreed that a service technician would be unhelpful because the intermittent nature of the problems means that I might not be able to demonstrate the problems and I wouldn't know right away if it had been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonora

customer_reviews.title: Turn off Energy Saver.  Thank me later
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! It’s truly and upgrade from what I had before. There are so many options for picture mode and sound. The size is perfect and very easy for me to put together myself without assistance. It was much lighter than I thought it would be as well. One suggestion, as others mentioned, turn off the energy saver! It’s a must to truly enjoy this TV in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: tonia

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: Great t.v.! With all do respect to the negative responses concerning the sound, I think the speakers actually sound great,I don't need a soundbar! The magic remove is smooth once you get a hang of it. Iam a spaz at times, and it does drive me nuts if I had a couple of brew hoppers. Picture is amazing. The 4k is truly breathtaking through Youtube, but on Amazon Prime, horrible. I haven't bought a 4k DVD player yet, and its slim pickins' on 4k broadcasts. I love this t.v. and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: joe hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv Very Smart Quick.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv probably the quickest to turn on an snap to netflix that ive ever seen. Looks very nice only drawback ive seen is in all dark room can see the light flaring up from bottom had adjust video settings a little. Very small issue an nothing that would affect me from purchasing another lg. Works great with my echo dot and my phones google assistant. Has suberb sound dont think a soundbar is needed for this tv at all lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn h.

customer_reviews.title: Hubby shit kittens over this one
customer_reviews.text: I managed to catch a great black friday deal on this thinking we needed a new tv anyhow. Did not realize all the features it came with. 4k is excellent! Especially love the documentaries on it. My husband was ecstatic about it as it was his anniversary gift. The sound is actually pretty good! I was worried we'd need to get a sound bar to be comparable to the other tv sound set up we had in the other room. Not necessary at all. Definitely happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: KayLove

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: I had an 65-inch OLED TV in my living room and decided to get this one for my bedroom since I thought it would save me a lot of money. However, this is what I see after getting this one. Watching movies with dark scenes on this TV is terrible. In the pictures you can see some white glows on the TV while it is supposed to be black, and actually it looks even worse in person. Just skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality smart tv
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a plasma tv that started to go out and it is a huge improvement. The smart options are good for Netflix, Amazon and Hulu but have not really tried the other options. Sound is good but not great (I run it through a receiver with speakers so don't utilize the speakers but they are decent). My only complaint is the picture settings. We seem to play with them a lot depending on what we are watching. For sports we like one setting and for movies and tv another and seems like no one can agree on one setting.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Calder

customer_reviews.title: Tv will not connect to WiFi -don’t  buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is horrible. It will Not connect to WiFi. I did everything to troubleshoot. I even bought an Ethernet cable and it still would not connect. This tv wasted my time and money. Others that purchased this tv have the same problem. LG’s customer service was awful. My off brand tv works just fine. I was trying to get a nicer tv that had a larger screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Picture not as great as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall it only took my son about 3-minutes to set up. Once set up the instructions weren't great as far as adjusting the settings, or what the settings even meant. We Googled setting and got the TV dialed in but have considered returning because I was really expecting the picture quality to be a vast improvement over the Vizio LCD TV I replaced this one with. I think an OLED or QLED would be a vast improvement but can't justify the additional expense at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G. Depot

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear, fantastic tv!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today, was double boxed which I was very pleased with worried about it being damaged in transit. Set it up and could not connect to the internectinternet. Contacted support and she was great and had me up running in a few minutes. Absolutely love LG products. Picture is fantastic, crystal clear, and I am so pleased with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this television because I was having trouble hearing our old one. We are very happy with this product, the picture is very clear, I almost feel as if I can reach out and touch the people on the screen. Most important, the sound is very clear and I don't have to blast the sound in order to hear it. Set up took my son and husband less than an hour. The was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Long wait but good picture
customer_reviews.text: Three stars are for shipping issues not tv. Great picture took a bit long to get since it had to be shipped and the first two were broken but a month is a bit long. Seems that the manufacturer needs to look a the packaging a bit more or don’t make the TVs so flimsy it’s only an inch thick. But that is true with all manufacturers. Anyway the one that finally worked had two boxes they surrounded the factory box inside another box with bubble wrap. I feel bad for the delivery people if this is a constant issue for them dealing with broken TVs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this TV
customer_reviews.text: The value is great for what I got. the picture is crisp, the HD picture is amazing and the functionality of the different HDMI ports and how it's integrated into the menus allows for easy access switching back and forth. This uses apps you can download through a store in the menus. Netflix and Amazon prime are preloaded and you can download, Youtube,. Disney + etc through this store. There are also games you can get but i haven't used them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. The sound is great. The picture quality is great. We are very pleased with our purchase!!! I had done some research on tvs and ultimately chose this one because it was the only affordable tv with a refresh rate of 120hz. It was easy to install and looks sleek. I should also add we’ve dropped the remote a few times more than I’d like, and it still works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: S Russell

customer_reviews.title: The LG 65SK8000PUA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this LG 65" and was delivered in 5 days, that was awesome. The LG 65SK8000PUA looks and feel are outstanding. Watching movies, shows and sports are out of this world. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: raptors

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with Quality customer service
customer_reviews.text: I did the research and picked the new TV I wanted, ordered it, waited for the shipment, and It came in damaged. I was heartbroken. I was offered a replacement or a refund, I knew I wanted that TV, so I had the second one shipped. It was well worth it. Just as advertised, the AI remote is the best remote I have ever used. The picture quality is fantastic and to my surprise, the sound is better than expected. Both Amazon and LG get 5 stars, well done.
customer_reviews.author: jerry m.

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV but...
customer_reviews.text: It will not connect to my Wifi. Therefore , I cannot comment on any smart features this TV might have. This replaced an 8 year old Vizio which had no problem connecting, along with any other device in the house. I have no idea how to fix this problem. A Google search reveals many others with Wifi issues with LG TV's. On the other hand, I connected my extra Firestick (easily connects) and have all the smart features that I really use. i.e. Netflix,Prime,Hulu. Other than that, the picture is fine - not that thrilled with the Magic remote.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Screen randomly blacks out
customer_reviews.text: Consistent issues with screen just blacking out entirely. Pretty serious issue, may have to look into returning
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sharp picture and goog overall quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Returned do to being a bit to larger for the room where is was set up. Downsides this is not a user friendly product and the instructions will have to be consulted on a regular basis. Also the remote is not as great as everone seems to believe at least in my Opinion the reason being is the laser is offset burnout an inch underneath the remote and thros off the nsturalpointability, also the design of the remote is backasseards.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vahey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found this deal over Black Friday weekend. Great TV. The picture is super clear, even to those who dont usually notice these things. My only issue would be the TV stand. It seems a little less sturdy than I had expected. We dont have little kids or pets and it sits on a large stand so Im not too concerned.. certainly not enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: William Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Google Assistant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture but a little dark sometimes, it seems to change the brightness on it's own. The biggest headache and one that had I known about it, I would not have bought this TV, is the 'baked in Google Assistant' that is quite annoying. I can't use the Remote without the Assistant's voice telling me what I'm watching, etc. "Why am I not in control of my own TV????
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations, again!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered as expected with care. I’m very partial to LG. Have always had great experiences with their products. This is for a new second home. So I went to my preferred tv product and I am delighted. This is bigger than my prior LG purchase, which is functioning well in my other home. Excellent color, detail, etc. I have a sound bar attached for enhanced quality. Will buy LG in future.
customer_reviews.author: JL from OCNJ

customer_reviews.title: Black screen turns to grey screen, becomes more noticiable when observed.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures of blacks on screen show the “bottom lit” aspect of the tv. A blank screen with white text in middle distort the entire black background turning the previous blacks to shades of grey. Good tv other than that, fast for gaming, turn HDR off for fps’s because of the processing delay, turn it back on for single player games makes it very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: stuart day

customer_reviews.title: Best TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: A really decent smart TV for the price! Not as great with movements, (as in sport and live action) , as would have liked, but not an OLED price either, and leaps and bounds (pun intended) above other TVs in the same price range. On a side note: Amazon's boxing was out of this world! It probably could have survived a 10 foot fall with all the protection. This was my main concern buying a TV online... the actual TV box and packaging was immaculate inside the amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: D Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tv!
customer_reviews.text: Previous TV was a Vizio, for nearly the same price the LG is much better quality and you don’t have to use a stupid remote on your phone. The HDMI ports on our Vizio all went out just a little over a year after purchase. Hoping this LG has better performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nick the Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. It's a really good price for the quality. I did a ton of shopping around. I'm glad I chose this one. I've been watching Our Planet on Netflix as a bedtime show (it utilizes Dolby Vision) and it is the most beautiful picture quality I've ever seen. I could not afford an 8k TV, but I wanted the best I could get for around $500 and I'm 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ermah Gerd

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV after my samsung 6 series developed the dreaded purple patch on the screen. Really hoping the class action suit gains more ground since samsung is STILL selling the 6 series. This LG model had everything I was looking for and then some. Only caveat is that you have to finagle with the picture settings to bring the picture to life.
customer_reviews.author: Opie

customer_reviews.title: LG 49" (2018 Model). Nice sharp picture.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very early, left by my front door, was notified by email. Easy setup, you have to screw in base, that does not swivel. Nice picture, Clear sharp color. I'm happy. Over the age of 60, you may want someone to help out. Basically easy. 49" LG TV. HDMI1 for TV and HDMI2 for DVD player. My original remote worked with it also. I paid $299.
customer_reviews.author: Lorz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm unsure if I could have done better for the price at the time of purchase but the T.V. is not perfect by any means. The most glaring issue is the backlight on a dark screen, very clear sections of light throughout the screen which takes away from any immersion while watching movies or series. I'd most likely go for a Vizio M-series rather than an LG if given the opportunity again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very bad image quality, Washed out image very bad black levels. The local dimming is a joke produces all kinds of artifects and washed out grainy areas. especially around text and logos, the magic remote makes a wide area of washed out light as the cursor moves on the screen. Wish I had bought a Samsung
customer_reviews.author: cougarnelson

customer_reviews.title: Price dosen't make it better
customer_reviews.text: This tv is very "average" for the price. I own several LG TVs and this one does not perform any better than cheaper 4K models. Save the money and buy the cheapest 4K LG model.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Excellent pictures and sound. I can connect it to the internet and watch amazon videos, youtube, surf the internet, watch korean dramas on viki. Can navagate it all with just the remote. Also if i turn on a game system the tv turn right to the outlet associated with the device. Very good tv.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good TV but will NOT work with Alexa, (Echo)
customer_reviews.text: will NOT work with Alexa, (Echo) I was REALLY hoping for the TV to work with Alexa, but it doesn't. Very SAD
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought htis as a gift but had the opportunity to see it. Picture quality at 4K was good, streaming function worked well, really a good buy. The one thing that bothered me was that I got a great price of <$700 and was going to buy one for myself but waited until after Christmas because no one would have been present to receive it. Well, they jumped the price $200, so I am forgoing buing one.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV was quite easy to install. Setup took all of 5 minutes, however, putting it on the stand took a little bit more time. Had it unwrapped, on its stand, and watching football in just about 20 minutes. Excellent TV quality and watching 4K movies on Netflix is AMAZING! Wish the TV was a bit cheaper, but who doesn't!?
customer_reviews.author: Leandra London

customer_reviews.title: Best when viewed from the center
customer_reviews.text: Calibrating the colors and stuff took me quite a while as the default settings really suck. However once you find what works for you this TV is really beautiful. One minor complaint is losing image quality when looking at it from a side angle.
customer_reviews.author: Illustrious

customer_reviews.title: Much to my surprise it is worth upgrading from HDTV
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old LG due to its picture quality. This new LG is superior to in all ways (sound, connectivity, flexibility) but ESPECIALLY in terms of picture quality. I thought HDTV was all I was ever going to need/want but this is genuine step up especially for watching sports like soccer, baseball and hockey with a small ball/puck and a larger field/arena.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Musler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not as nice as I thought. Yes this my fist lcd. And the picture in my old led Sony tv is more sharper and more vivid. I can see a sort of blur near picture features. The sound is good though but this is not important for me as I connect it to a marants receiver. So most area I focused when buying is the picture quality as this the only thing I use in a tv. I am now considering to get the oled lg as I like the lg design. And I like to retire from Sony that’s too much expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Juleschris

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd or bedroom TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to use and set up TV. Bought for the family room. Smart features are similar to my OLED tv. Biggest issue is that the TV constantly drops the WIFI so I would suggest making sure you can plug into a LAN. Since I did that I’ve had no issues. Picture quality is good considering the price of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great family tv
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for TV that was becoming too old compared to the other new TVs we have in the home this one is the best. You may find videos on YouTube and elsewhere that say the darks are not that dark but for a living room that has plenty of windows to bring in sunlight it works very well. Unless you are making a room with no windows a new cinema area this TV is right on the money. Even works well with video games as it has a game mode That if set correctly or automatically come on.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for senior relatives. The magic remote is having issues pairing with their cable system and surround sound system. Picture quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Twigg

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for the hubby for his birthday around Christmas 2018. I was a little apprehensive with such a big purchase, but after reading many reviews I decided to order. I cannot say enough about this television, the sound, the incredible sharp picture as well as all it's Smart features. The price was amazing, a Black Friday purchase. Everyone who comes to the house comments on how clear the picture is. Many of our friends have paid way more for their TV's and are stunned when I tell them what I paid. My husband still comments, it was the Best birthday gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Livvismom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's like having a 65 inch cell phone......all you have to do is plug the TV into the wall, its truly Wireless, just download all your apps without having to hook anything up to the television.....
customer_reviews.author: ali fazle

customer_reviews.title: Find one with full array
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and don't buy this TV. Find one with full array. If I didn't already have this on the wall and returning wouldn't be so difficult I'd be sending back. On what's supposed to be a black screen with a logo in the corner or a loaded symbol or something that whole side of the TV will light up. So horrible unless you're watching in a bright room.
customer_reviews.author: C. Botten

customer_reviews.title: LG 4k TV
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, clear picture and very nice sound. I needed to take off the energy saving feature in the settings and add the HDR setting and the picture improved. Also keep it plugged into the internet modem and it automatically updates and this also improves the picture quality. It took me about an hour to set up, with the stand being the most difficult to put together. The TV arrived on the date Amazon said it would arrive and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hilgerman

customer_reviews.title: Check this TV out!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for less than $800. Looks awesome in my living room. Metal back, not cheap plastic. Back lighting.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Brazee

customer_reviews.title: If something goes wrong, don’t count on LG correct the problem
customer_reviews.text: We got this TV as a wedding gift in 2018. We had for for about a month when we noticed that there was a huge line in the middle of the screen. We tried to contact LG about a tech coming out to fix it numerous times, but we could never get anyone to return calls or emails about the fix, so we finally gave up. Now the remote control is finicky. My biggest issue here, is with LG customer service. The TV itself is okay, but the customer service is almost nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a little fiddling, but it's a great TV
customer_reviews.text: It took quite a bit of fiddling around to get the colors just right; out of the box, I found the flesh tones on people's faces to be a bit off, and the contrast was too high, so it seemed the picture didn't have enough depth. What I did was pause the stream on a news show with a couple of "talking heads" and adjusted the various color settings until it looked right to me. Since then I haven't had to adjust it at all. Other than that color issue it's been a great TV, beautiful picture and a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: Ah yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Big screen! Wonderful picture. Excellent sound. Came with the magic remote - didn't need to purchase separately! Has the better base instead of those little legs. My son-in-law is our tech go-to help: once the set was on it practically installed itself! It loaded all my stuff - including my Fire TV!
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Good TV, but needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bargain for me to acquire such good quality TV for this Black Friday. However, the screwing part of the stand was ridiculous because I couldn't get it done by my screw driver, so I had to borrow a power driver to get the job done. In addition to that, I see a little dent on the back of TV's metal part, but I should keep quiet because the TV works fine and I love how it plays out.
customer_reviews.author: Gunwook Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: Backlight goes dim for no reason. I have only owned this for two months. I am extremely disappointing in this TV. Customer service was no help.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and size for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted in 65" smart TV. Build and screen quality is great for the money. There are several ways to navigate the smart features and has good programmability. I would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Max Beach

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 HDMI inputs
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great. Picture was very easy to tune to my preferences. There's a dedicated Netflix button that when will turn in the TV going directly to Netflix without waking any of the game consoles connected to it. Start up time is very fast and menus are very fast/responsive as well. The remote is not tiny and not huge. The sound it puts out is pretty impressive. All around very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M Horgan

customer_reviews.title: area dimming is wonky, but otherwise superb picture quality
customer_reviews.text: When there is only white text on a black background, I can see a very strange effect where an entire vertical part of the screen lights up, rather than just the region of the text. When you use the settings to heighten the dimming effect, it goes away, but distorts the image too much. You have to really pay attention to notice though
customer_reviews.author: The Cynical Historian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The hubby likes it! He’s a tough customer... Happy hubby, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great TV Smart AI and affordable
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional device. The WebOS and AI are very impressive. AI suggests real solutions when you ask a fairly complex troubleshooting question. The setup of the TV was one of best experiences with any device. The picture controls are accessible and effective. The sound features include Dolby Atmos.
customer_reviews.author: ZACK SHAHIN

customer_reviews.title: Alexa compatibility is very limited
customer_reviews.text: The add says it is Alexa compatible.. and Amazon has a page showing what you "can" do with Alexa. However this TV has a very limited interface with Alexa. So far I was only able to make it turn on or off.. or access youtube. None of the things I was most interested, such as show my cloud cameras or my ring front doorbell were able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Screen randomly goes dark
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the tv within the first two weeks because the screen kept getting really dark on the sides. The center 2/3rds remained normal. The only way to fix this is to cycle through the picture settings. It did this nearly every time we turned it on. Amazon replaced the tv for us but the replacement does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Highly enjoyable viewing
customer_reviews.text: TVs have lots of “features” these days and this one has its share too, but ultimately it’s about the picture and this set has gorgeous optics. Might not grab you first at a big box store with a a zillion screens going but it offers low-fatigue super high-res and smooth, elegant realism
customer_reviews.author: KeithM

customer_reviews.title: Great picture bad sound
customer_reviews.text: I like this tv, although they could improve the streaming app interfaces. The picture is phenomenal, but the sound is extremely labile especially between dialog and ambient sounds (ie. Explosions/gunfire in an action movie). This also applies in general when switching between hdmi sources as well as streaming apps.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R. Viele

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you love throwing away money!
customer_reviews.text: After less than two years of ownership the TV randomly developed a bar of lines from top to bottom. Of course the TV is out of warranty and LG does not stand behind their products! Will never buy an LG product again!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: So fancy
customer_reviews.text: I've had cheaper "smart" TVs and this one just blows them all away. It was a bit bigger than I thought it would be, but the picture is crisp and the sound is perfect for my small apartment. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mnash

customer_reviews.title: great picture quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. Adjust the power save setting so the screen isn't dark and bingo! You got a bamf tv!
customer_reviews.author: kevobarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as a Christmas gift for my son and his wife. They really love the TV. I helped him install the TV and it only took us 45 minutes to hang it on the wall and get it setup. It was very easy to setup...basically we just tuned it on and followed the onscreen prompts. So far they say they are really enjoying this TV. They say the picture quality is excellent. I'm glad I bought it...it turned out to be an awesome Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. McFee

customer_reviews.title: Incompatibly issues.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to write a review since the tv was incompatible with my cable service. The speaking menu was horrendous! I just couldn't use this tv.
customer_reviews.author: BMXmike78

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in the street
customer_reviews.text: Tv assembled in the street ??? Tv works great so far , but why Did the Delivery guys unbox and assembled The tv outside in the street I can’t believe it I asked them and they said they always do that (unbelievable) Plus the box had a large hole in it But thank goodness the tv working
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family room and had Amazon send someone to mount it for me. It’s all worked out perfectly, nice big screen, decent sound from the built in speakers, and the picture is terrific. There are lots of better TVs out there but for this price (I paid around $900) it’s a great thing, the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: spammythepig

customer_reviews.title: Extra things with TV
customer_reviews.text: I did not have a problem with the TV (LG49SK8000pua) I was inquiring about ads from other sellers where their same TV came with other things like an HDMI cable, surge protector, a keyboard looking thing, screen cleaner and one or two other things, and I was just wondering if my order was to have those things, which it didn't. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: sammie

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The tv is pretty sweet, my only complaint is that oddly it wasn’t as clear as I thought it would be. I have a 13 year old LG plasma that still has the crisp clear picture. It’s a 4/5 for me
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The software for this TV is pretty good. Nice picture if you have some light in the room. Keep in mind how much bigger 65" is than 55". Maybe look at some in the store before buying online. Lighter than my smaller LCD TV that I replaced with this too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture is dark not the brightness I thought a 4 k should be. First tv I received screen was broken second one which I’m sending back back is dented. Amazon stands behind there products no hassle returned I purchased a Samsung (hope it’s better). I’m surprised st the the picture quality my entire house is lg dryer/washer, dishwasher,micro , frig,stove
customer_reviews.author: carol paul

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, great price, sound quality subpar, but may be typical of the newer TV’s.5
customer_reviews.text: Interesting how all the “stars” I am able to give for this TV don’t refer to sound quality. Seems like this is a problem for all of the newer TV’s. May have to spend more $$ to get something called a sound bar to improve sound quality. Otherwise, every other feature is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Powers off all the time
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV, its optical sound output shuts off constantly and you have to change volume to get it back. It also shuts itself off up 4 times an hour due to a faulty power supply which they want me to pay for someone to come look at. I lost every last dollar spent on this TV and looking for a proper replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: James Carson

customer_reviews.title: In 01 I paid 5k. This is better for 1100
customer_reviews.text: If you're shopping for a TV, you probably know it's gonna last 5 years max. Stop buyi g it like it was an item you were gonna have for a long time. For the money, best set available
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sheridan

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 65SK8000 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:65-Inch| Style:TVThe SK8000 is accented by its tasteful frame with a distinguished brushed texture that enhances any room. This new LG SUPER UHD TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ becomes the hub for the smart home: Using Intelligent Voice control, speak into the LG Magic Remote to pull up family photos, control light settings, check the weather and more. The α7 (Alpha7) Intelligent Processor works in tandem with the Nano Cell Display to deliver truer colors, deeper black levels and a wider viewing angle, while the local dimming backlight reveals a remarkably accurate picture with dazzling 4K detail. The SK8000 features comprehensive support of major 4K high dynamic range formats including premium Dolby Vision, as well as HDR10 and HLG.

*Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscription.
*Dolby Vision is a trademark of Dolby Laboratories.
*Dolby, Dolby Atmos and the double-D symbol are registered trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.
feature_bullets: LG SUPER UHD TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ has the Google Assistant built in, so you can control compatible smart home devices using just your voice through the LG Magic Remote. Create a center for your smart home and beyond. Plus it works with Amazon Alexa devices (sold separately)
Local dimming can brighten and dim independently, enhancing contrast and achieving deeper black levels for a rich, lifelike image

4K Cinema HDR on LG SUPER UHD TV with AI ThinQ features comprehensive support of major high dynamic range formats including Dolby Vision, as well as HDR10 and HLG, both with LG’s advanced tone-mapping technology that provides scene-by-scene optimization
Dolby Atmos is the same audio technology developed for state-of-the-art cinemas, with an immersive sound that appears to come from everywhere, putting you in the middle of all the excitement
Nano Cell Display has an expanded color gamut to deliver truer colors. It also absorbs unwanted light and reduces reflectivity to assure deeper black levels, even at a wider viewing angle
Inputs: 4 HDMI, 3 USB, 1 RF, 1 Composite in, 1 Ethernet, 1 Optical, 1 RS232C (Mini Jack) and Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI
Dimensions (Wx H x D): TV without stand 57.3" x 33.2" x 2.5", TV with stand: 57.3" x 36.1" x 12.5"

α7 Intelligent Processor enhances 4K HDR content for a truly cinematic experience. Enjoy a more lifelike picture with superior depth, sharpness, and remarkably accurate color.Wall Mount VESA 300 x 300

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
